actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to provide financial aid to local fire departments in the purchase of advanced firefighting equipment.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to provide grants to local fire departments to cover one-half of the cost of the purchase of firefighting equipment. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial aid to local fire departments in the purchase of advanced firefighting equipment.
